attributes.action: investigate and bring criminal child neglect charges against the Haringey social workers who let Baby P die
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these people need to be made aware of their criminal neglect of Baby P, caused by their mismanagement of his case. They have shown no remorse and have indeed already absolved themselves of any blame. I think as they are appointed to safeguard Baby P and showed a lack of diligance and care they are also guilty of the crime. At the very least they should be dimissed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
